author: jhutchinson
title: Roma vs Villarreal: Spanish side’s captain Bruno brings his own TOILET ROLL to Europa League last 32 clash away at Roma
text:
EFL FEELING NERVOUS? Roma vs Villarreal: Spanish side’s captain Bruno brings his own TOILET ROLL to Europa League last 32 clash away at Roma 
It's no wonder Villarreal's players could be nervous - they were spanked 4-0 at home in the first leg in Spain Pictured
